name: CNN
text:
Officers will now be required to announce their presence and purpose before entering, except in certain circumstances like hostage situations, Minneapolis Mayor Jacob Frey and Police Chief Medaria Arradondo said in a joint news release.

name: CNN
text: Macy's says its 2020 holiday window displays are "a form of a thank you letter to first responders, essential workers, marchers for equality, and New Yorkers who showed their grit, good humor, and hopeful spirit" during the year https://t.co/WjoBMfThc4 https://t.co/cROZyQV6v0
